text:
November 11, 1953
Mr* G. Norman Falser
Falser Novelty Company
37 Englewood Avenue
Worcester 3, Massachusetts
Dear M r* Falser;
On February 16 of this year you wrote inquiring about the New York televsion
study conducted by Dallas w* Smythe. This study is now available in
printed form* Entitled "Three Years of New York Television", the book
soils for $5.00*
Sincerely,
enc*
Rosaline T* Biason
Traffic Manager
